synopsis.text:
Mofu Village comes alive in this delightful spin-off from the Ousama Sentai King-Ohger TV series, presenting the beloved in-world anime, Moffun to Issho. Originally aired on the Toei Tokusatsu Fanclub (TTFC) app, this series follows the daring adventures of cryptid hunter Panpy as he embarks on a quest to find a mythical yeti in the snow-covered mountains.

Upon encountering the legendary yeti, Moffun, Panpy is whisked away to the enchanting Mofu Village. There, he experiences a world of thrilling escapades and heartwarming camaraderie alongside his newfound furry friend. Join Panpy and Moffun as they explore the captivating world of Mofu Village in this charming series that has captured the hearts of fans within the King-Ohger universe and beyond.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
